content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to read the file "language_resources.txt" and your computer returned a list of language learning resources. Additionally, you gave me a command to browse the website "https://www.atlasobscura.com/" and find unique destinations and interesting stories associated with them. However, the command to get hyperlinks from the website failed due to too much output. Do not execute this command again with the same arguments. You also gave me a command to Google "information about love".'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.nytimes.com/2014/02/20/theater/love-and-information-by-caryl-churchill-at-minetta-lane.html", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Love_and_Information", "https://www.verywellmind.com/what-is-love-2795343", "https://theconversation.com/what-is-love-139212", "https://www.goodtherapy.org/blog/psychpedia/love", "https://theatredance.utexas.edu/event/love-information", "https://livearts.org/show/love-and-information/", "https://www.concordtheatricals.com/p/12705/love-and-information"]'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "love_quotes.txt"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command read_file returned: Error: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/love_quotes.txt'"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Failure: command list_files returned too much output.                         Do not execute this command again with the same arguments.'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "language learning resources"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.alllanguageresources.com/", "https://www.thoughtco.com/languages-4133094", "https://www.theintrepidguide.com/top-language-learning-resources/", "https://www.transparent.com/language-resources/", "https://www.bpl.org/learning-tools/language-learning/", "https://www.odni.gov/index.php/who-we-are/organizations/policy-capabilities/ic-human-capital/chco-related-menus/ic-human-capital-related-links/foreign-language/ic-human-capital-foreign-language-related-links/language-training-resources", "https://www.learningresources.com/shop/subject/english-language-arts", "https://www.lingualift.com/blog/best-language-learning-resources/"]'}]
"""
